thread.title: To the safe space! Keystone pipeline announcement triggers the Left
thread.title_full: To the safe space! Keystone pipeline announcement triggers the Left

author: Doug P.
title: To the safe space! Keystone pipeline announcement triggers the Left
text:
— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 23, 2017 
Cue the anti-Keystone freakout: 
— Lady Jane (@janetpriley) March 23, 2017 This is what happens when Exxon runs the State Department #NoKXL #KeystoneXL https://t.co/12oXRIVci4 
— Martin O'Malley (@MartinOMalley) March 23, 2017 @AP Such bullshit. Recipe for disaster. 
— Kate Dougherty (@Kate_Doc) March 23, 2017 @politico This will kill our water, land and environment all for greedy money. 
— Rhonda Sternowski (@RhondaSternows1) March 23, 2017 Bro this is the America I don't want to live in https://t.co/MkQDsQbCY8 
— del taco (@emmaelyse_) March 23, 2017 @AP More HORRIBLE ideas from the @GOP and @realDonaldTrump . Screw clean water, clean air, or a livable planet, as LONG AS YOU GET RICH! 
— Dumpy McTrumperton (@mctrumperton) March 23, 2017 @AP @texyellowdogdem Umm… what State Department? Tillerson? Sounds more communist than democratic, kinda like dictatorships… 
— NEVER my prez (@A_Big_Hell_NO) March 23, 2017 "When the last tree is cut down and the last stream poisoned, you will soon realize wealth is not in banks and that you can't eat money." https://t.co/fTLUK0H0FQ
